entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Rosthern
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
